name: Wellness tracker - Notion template
description: Take control of your digestive health with the all-in-one Wellness Tracker Notion template. This comprehensive hub helps you uncover the connection between your daily habits, lifestyle choices, and gastrointestinal well-being â€” giving you data-driven insights to improve your gut health naturally.What it solvesDemystifying Digestive Health:At the heart of this system lies the Bowel Motions Tracker, designed to help you monitor your daily movements and visualize them in a structured calendar grid
features: Bowel Motions Tracker:Monitor your bowel movements with monthly grid visualization to identify trends and correlations.; Symptom Grid View:Analyze your symptoms in a clear calendar format for easier pattern recognition.; Habits & Logs System:Track habits visually with a grid-based log view for consistency and motivation.; Medication Tracker:Keep a record of your active medications, dosages, and durations for better adherence and awareness.; To-do:Balance your to-dos with self-care and wellness goals.; Mood Tracker:Log and reflect on your emotional state, identifying links to gut or lifestyle changes.; Sleep Log:Monitor sleep duration, quality, and patterns to understand their impact on digestion and energy.
